verses.verse: Now these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> who were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in <S%H2275>Hebron:<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> <S%H550>Amnon,<s%> of <S%H293>Ahinoam<s%> the <S%H3159>Jezreelitess;<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> of <S%H26>Abigail<s%> the <S%H3762>Carmelitess;<s%>

the <S%H7992>third,<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maacah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H8526>Talmai<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1650>Geshur;<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth,<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith;<s%>

<S%H8337>six<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> and there he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H2320>months.<s%> In <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%>

and these were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H8092>Shimea,<s%> and <S%H7727>Shobab,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H702>four,<s%> of <S%H1340>Bathshua<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel;<s%>
All these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> besides the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6370>concubines;<s%> and <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> was their <S%H269>sister.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah:<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H3110>Johanan,<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah,<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H7967>Shallum.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6305>Pedaiah:<s%> <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel:<s%> <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> and <S%H2608>Hananiah;<s%> and <S%H8019>Shelomith<s%> was their <S%H269>sister;<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2608>Hananiah:<s%> <S%H6410>Pelatiah,<s%> and <S%H3470>Jeshaiah;<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7509>Rephaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H770>Arnan,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5662>Obadiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7935>Shecaniah.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7935>Shecaniah:<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah:<s%> <S%H2407>Hattush,<s%> and <S%H3008>Igal,<s%> and <S%H1282>Bariah,<s%> and <S%H5294>Neariah,<s%> and <S%H8202>Shaphat,<s%> <S%H8337>six.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H454>Elioenai:<s%> <S%H1939>Hodaviah,<s%> and <S%H475>Eliashib,<s%> and <S%H6411>Pelaiah,<s%> and <S%H6126>Akkub,<s%> and <S%H3110>Johanan,<s%> and <S%H1806>Delaiah,<s%> and <S%H6054>Anani,<s%> <S%H7651>seven.<s%>
